title: New Loft Avail with Ultra-Ceilings, Exposed Brick and Beams! MUST SEE!
posting_body: Write your real email address into your inquiry.

Just opened 2 br loft building in desirable Melrose.
-Fabulous hiking trails right outside your door!
There are additional 2 bedrooms available for later move-in dates.
"Beautiful loft apartments available at an entirely rehabbed factory in desirable Melrose.
Featuring towering 14" to 18" ceilings with exposed brick and wooden beams!
The lofts feel very spacious with its ultra high ceilings and the oversized custom windows let in tons of sunlight!
Right across the street is Middlesex Fells Reservation which has continuous miles of hiking trails, including a beautiful waterfall not far from the building!
With the hiking trails and the pet wash, this is a dog lovers dream property!
This property really is a gem!
-Sun Terrace with Lounge Seating and Fire Pit
-Hike the Trails at Middlesex Fells Reservation
-Quick Walk to Oak Grove Station (Orange Line)
and a minimum gross household income of
We specialize in assisting renters to secure apartments when they're not available to tour the property in person.
Please note that the pricing is based off the most recent availability given and can change at any time.
It's always advised to see the unit right away before it gets secured by someone else.
Please also note that the pictures are of a similar apartment inside the same property and are a good representation of what the advertised apartment will look like.
Melrose is a quick drive to Boston and Cambridge.
Melrose's surrounding communities are Malden, Medford, Revere, Stoneham, Saugus, and Wakefield.
“Be yourself; everyone else is already taken.”
